hiveArticle.title: A beautiful Sunset on a Beach
hiveArticle.body:
A lazy evening on a beach and captured a beautiful sunset in Digha which is a seaside resort town in the state of West Bengal, India.

![IMG_20161215_165032221_HDR.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmezdb6u9dmEnUEjioB8E8W862HjbQnuLu3f22rPZuJorD/IMG_20161215_165032221_HDR.jpg)

![IMG_20161215_165118049.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRD7JnWkEhwgtdxaUw1Xw29R99BUNHoZ1fUUDkBk5gzUc/IMG_20161215_165118049.jpg)

![IMG_20161215_165208316_HDR.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVkhNvtnBtFwsDkR6rMYJCYRHhMVqRy3Xb8hNRfFD3KrR/IMG_20161215_165208316_HDR.jpg)

All pictures are original, in case if you have doubt.
